about_the_game:
Welcome to RadioWorld, a brand new robotics attraction aimed for families and people of all ages. Step into a unique world and experience the showcase of brand new, highly trained and powered AI robotics with bright and wonderful colours to entice your eye and advanced robot movement! What are you waiting for? Come to RadioWorld!

RadioWave is a semi-realistic indie horror first person game set in the 2000s featuring killer robotics, an enticing three-part story in Campaign Mode, murderous fun in Multiplayer Mode, and challenges to await in Custom Mode. Can you survive the RadioWave?

The ULTIMATE Mascot Horror Game!

RadioWave is the definitive game for mascot horror fans featuring:

  • Semi-realistic environments and beautiful lighting

  • Fun Maze Action that utilizes your stealth skills to sneak past robots.

  • Use items like the radio to find the location of where RadioWave and his friends are!

  • Play with friends in Multiplayer Mode!

Campaign Mode

Play as Detective Robbie, as you've been assigned to investigate and find out what happened at RadioWorld involving the robots going awry and murdering patrons, controlled by an evil and murderous hacker who once worked at the company seeking out revenge. Escape evil forces, use strategy to avoid RadioWave and his friends and arrest the hacker while uncovering the mystery. Will you make it out alive?

Custom Mode

Want some more enticing action? Enter Custom Mode, a free sandbox mode featuring maps from the Campaign aswell as exclusive mazes for that mode. Choose which robots you want to activate, how aggressive they are and escape the map! Earn more points the more difficult the map is, and get a new highscore or speedrun!

Multiplayer Mode

Salvage scrap in RadioWorld and extract as a Scavenger with others, or kill all the scavengers as a robot of your choice. Fun and fast-paced, evade the robots and chase players in large mazes! An active internet connection is required to use this mode.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, gore and depictions of dead bodies are shown in-game, mostly only in Campaign. Blood and gore can be toggled in the in-game settings and will disable certain scenes/props. Fearful scenes are present at almost all times during the game which is set in dark and low-light environments.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10-11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100f
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 4060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
